revision.summary: Mandatory global ClusterRevision attribute added; CCB 1811 1812 1821
All Hubs changes and added feature map
New data model format and notation. Added User features. General cleanup of functionality
Added support for European door locks (unbolt feature)
Removed LOG and NOT feature, fixed constraints on NumberOf*Schedules attributes. and added support for Aliro credential provisioning

feature.name: PINCredential
feature.summary: Lock supports PIN credentials (via keypad, or over-the-air)

feature.name: FingerCredentials
feature.summary: Lock supports finger related credentials (fingerprint, finger vein)

feature.name: WeekDayAccessSchedules
feature.summary: Lock supports week day user access schedules

feature.name: DoorPositionSensor
feature.summary: Lock supports a door position sensor that indicates door's state

feature.name: FaceCredentials
feature.summary: Lock supports face related credentials (face, iris, retina)

feature.name: CredentialOverTheAirAccess
feature.summary: PIN codes over-the-air supported for lock/unlock operations

feature.name: User
feature.summary: Lock supports the user commands and database

feature.name: YearDayAccessSchedules
feature.summary: Lock supports year day user access schedules

feature.name: AliroProvisioning
feature.summary: Lock supports Aliro credential provisioning as defined in [Aliro]

feature.name: AliroBLEUWB
feature.summary: Lock supports the Bluetooth LE + UWB Access Control Flow as defined in [Aliro]

item.name: LockJammed
item.summary: Locking Mechanism Jammed

item.name: LockFactoryReset
item.summary: Lock Reset to Factory Defaults

item.name: LockRadioPowerCycled
item.summary: Lock Radio Power Cycled

item.name: WrongCodeEntryLimit
item.summary: Tamper Alarm - wrong code entry limit

item.summary: Tamper Alarm - front escutcheon removed from main

item.name: DoorForcedOpen
item.summary: Forced Door Open under Door Locked Condition

item.name: DoorAjar
item.summary: Door ajar

item.name: ForcedUser
item.summary: Force User SOS alarm

item.name: Single
item.summary: Only one credential is required for lock operation

item.name: Dual
item.summary: Any two credentials are required for lock operation

item.name: Tri
item.summary: Any three credentials are required for lock operation

item.name: ProgrammingPIN
item.summary: Programming PIN code credential type

item.name: PIN
item.summary: PIN code credential type

item.name: RFID
item.summary: RFID identifier credential type

item.name: Fingerprint
item.summary: Fingerprint identifier credential type

item.name: FingerVein
item.summary: Finger vein identifier credential type

item.name: Face
item.summary: Face identifier credential type

item.name: AliroCredentialIssuerKey
item.summary: A Credential Issuer public key as defined in [Aliro]

item.name: AliroEvictableEndpointKey
item.summary: An Endpoint public key as defined in [Aliro] which can be evicted if space is needed for another endpoint key

item.name: AliroNonEvictableEndpointKey
item.summary: An Endpoint public key as defined in [Aliro] which cannot be evicted if space is needed for another endpoint key

item.name: Add
item.summary: Data is being added or was added

item.name: Clear
item.summary: Data is being cleared or was cleared

item.name: Modify
item.summary: Data is being modified or was modified

item.name: DoorOpen
item.summary: Door state is open

item.name: DoorClosed
item.summary: Door state is closed

item.name: DoorJammed
item.summary: Door state is jammed

item.name: DoorForcedOpen
item.summary: Door state is currently forced open

item.name: DoorUnspecifiedError
item.summary: Door state is invalid for unspecified reason

item.name: DoorAjar
item.summary: Door state is ajar

item.name: Operation
item.summary: Event type is operation

item.name: Programming
item.summary: Event type is programming

item.name: Alarm
item.summary: Event type is alarm

item.name: NoLEDSignal
item.summary: Never use LED for signalization

item.name: NoLEDSignalAccessAllowed
item.summary: Use LED signalization except for access allowed events

item.name: LEDSignalAll
item.summary: Use LED signalization for all events

item.name: Unspecified
item.summary: Unspecified or manufacturer specific lock user data added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: ProgrammingCode
item.summary: Lock programming PIN code was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: UserIndex
item.summary: Lock user index was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: WeekDaySchedule
item.summary: Lock user week day schedule was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: YearDaySchedule
item.summary: Lock user year day schedule was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: HolidaySchedule
item.summary: Lock holiday schedule was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: PIN
item.summary: Lock user PIN code was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: RFID
item.summary: Lock user RFID code was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: Fingerprint
item.summary: Lock user fingerprint was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: FingerVein
item.summary: Lock user finger-vein information was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: Face
item.summary: Lock user face information was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: AliroCredentialIssuerKey
item.summary: An Aliro credential issuer key credential was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: AliroEvictableEndpointKey
item.summary: An Aliro endpoint key credential which can be evicted credential was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: AliroNonEvictableEndpointKey
item.summary: An Aliro endpoint key credential which cannot be evicted was added, cleared, or modified.

item.name: Lock
item.summary: Lock operation

item.name: Unlock
item.summary: Unlock operation

item.name: NonAccessUserEvent
item.summary: Triggered by keypad entry for user with User Type set to Non Access User

item.name: ForcedUserEvent
item.summary: Triggered by using a user with UserType set to Forced User

item.name: Unlatch
item.summary: Unlatch operation

item.name: NotFullyLocked
item.summary: Lock state is not fully locked

item.name: Locked
item.summary: Lock state is fully locked

item.name: Unlocked
item.summary: Lock state is fully unlocked

item.name: Unlatched
item.summary: Lock state is fully unlocked and the latch is pulled

item.name: DeadBolt
item.summary: Physical lock type is dead bolt

item.name: Magnetic
item.summary: Physical lock type is magnetic

item.name: Other
item.summary: Physical lock type is other

item.name: Mortise
item.summary: Physical lock type is mortise

item.name: Rim
item.summary: Physical lock type is rim

item.name: LatchBolt
item.summary: Physical lock type is latch bolt

item.name: CylindricalLock
item.summary: Physical lock type is cylindrical lock

item.name: TubularLock
item.summary: Physical lock type is tubular lock

item.name: InterconnectedLock
item.summary: Physical lock type is interconnected lock

item.name: DeadLatch
item.summary: Physical lock type is dead latch

item.name: DoorFurniture
item.summary: Physical lock type is door furniture

item.name: Eurocylinder
item.summary: Physical lock type is euro cylinder

item.name: Unspecified
item.summary: Lock/unlock error caused by unknown or unspecified source

item.name: InvalidCredential
item.summary: Lock/unlock error caused by invalid PIN, RFID, fingerprint or other credential

item.name: DisabledUserDenied
item.summary: Lock/unlock error caused by disabled USER or credential

item.name: Restricted
item.summary: Lock/unlock error caused by schedule restriction

item.name: InsufficientBattery
item.summary: Lock/unlock error caused by insufficient battery power left to safely actuate the lock

item.name: Unspecified
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from unspecified source

item.name: Manual
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from manual operation (key, thumbturn, handle, etc).

item.name: ProprietaryRemote
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from proprietary remote source (e.g. vendor app/cloud)

item.name: Keypad
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from keypad

item.name: Auto
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from lock automatically (e.g. relock timer)

item.name: Button
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from lock button (e.g. one touch or button)

item.name: Schedule
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from lock due to a schedule

item.name: Remote
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from remote node

item.name: RFID
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from RFID card

item.name: Biometric
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from biometric source (e.g. face, fingerprint/fingervein)

item.name: Aliro
item.summary: Lock/unlock operation came from an interaction defined in [Aliro], or user change operation was a step-up credential provisioning as defined in [Aliro]

item.summary: Silent Mode

item.summary: High Volume

item.name: Medium
item.summary: Medium Volume

item.name: DUPLICATE
item.summary: Entry would cause a duplicate credential/ID.

item.name: OCCUPIED
item.summary: Entry would replace an occupied slot.

item.name: Available
item.summary: The user ID is available

item.name: OccupiedEnabled
item.summary: The user ID is occupied and enabled

item.name: OccupiedDisabled
item.summary: The user ID is occupied and disabled

item.summary: The user ID type is unrestricted

item.summary: The user ID type is schedule

item.name: ProgrammingUser
item.summary: The user ID type is programming

item.name: NonAccessUser
item.summary: The user ID type is non access

item.summary: The user ID type is forced

item.name: DisposableUser
item.summary: The user ID type is disposable

item.name: ExpiringUser
item.summary: The user ID type is expiring

item.name: ScheduleRestrictedUser
item.summary: The user ID type is schedule restricted

item.name: RemoteOnlyUser
item.summary: The user ID type is remote only
